title: 6.7 Patch update Black screen error
body: Just updated my client to 6.7 everything is fine with that. get to the login screen pass that. but when i enter the home screen for league nothing shows up just a message in a box in the corner saying nothing. My only option is to close out of league. Could someone please tell me whats going on and how i can prevent it, tried restarting. Nothing fixes it... Help!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if this helps at all.
Hmm, this hasn't happened to me. If you can't find a solution, then possibly remove League from your computer and then re-install it.
Yes I have the same the problem can someone pls help
